name: Dimer Dalna
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.quantity: 20 cloves ground to a fine paste

ingredients.name: Ginger
ingredients.quantity: Â½ inch ground to a fine paste

steps: Boil the eggs, peel them, make vertical incisions on their surface, rub with salt and a bit of turmeric powder and keep aside.
Peel the potatoes, cut it into two halves, wash and keep aside.
Heat oil in pan, fry the eggs and keep aside.
In the remaining oil fry the potatoes till golden brown and keep aside.
Then add the sliced onions and fry till golden brown in colour.
Add Ginger paste, Garlic paste, turmeric powder, Red Chillie powder and tomato and stirfry till the mixture releases oil from its sides.
Add the potatoes and stirfry for 2 minutes.
Add 4 cups of water and salt.
Cover lid and let it come to a boil.
When the mixture is boiling fully add the eggs and let the mixture boil with covered lid.
When the potato is fully boiled add garam masala.
Your Dimer Dalna is ready to be served.
